content: David is just awesome! His teaching has completely transformed my playing—now I can solo with confidence!
His improvisation class taught me to speak musically and connect with other players on stage.

I've tried a lot of guitar courses in the past. Just when I was about to give up in frustration, I found David. He's motivated me through setbacks, and last week I even performed a song he'd taught me for my grandkids. I'm extremely grateful!
I've taken David's Absolute Beginner class. David is a very jovial instructor and makes learning fun. 100% recommend to anyone starting from scratch!
David's structured approach helped me master barre chords in weeks. His feedback is always precise and encouraging.
Joining David's blues workshop was the best decision I made. His insight into phrasing and feel opened up a whole new world of expression.
One-on-one sessions with David are amazing—he tailors each lesson to my goals and keeps me inspired to practice every day.
After five years of lessons, I still look forward to every session with David. His depth of knowledge and patience have taken my playing further than I ever imagined.
